text: When the days of feasting were over, Job would send for them and purify them by getting up early in the morning to offer a burnt offering for each of them. He was concerned, thinking to himself, “Maybe my children have sinned in some way and have unintentionally offended1:5. The word used here is “blessed” but is usually understood as a euphemism for “cursed.” God.” This is what Job always did.
